00014 const unsigned ID_LEN = 6;
00015 struct Person
00016 {
00017   char ID[ID_LEN + 1];
00018   char lastName[26];   
00019   char firstName[26];  
00020   float salary;        
00021   unsigned years;           
00022 };

00049 
00050 Person **PersonRecs;
00051 
00052 ostream& operator<<(ostream &os, const Person &person)
00053 {
00054   char buffer[100];
00055   sprintf(buffer, "Key: %8s, Name: %12s, %12s \nSalary:%7.0f, Years: %2d", 
00056                   person.ID, person.lastName, person.firstName, person.salary, person.years);
00057   os << buffer;
00058   return os;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void FreePersonRecs(void)
00062 {
00063   size_t count = sizeof(PEOPLE) / sizeof(*PEOPLE);
00064 
00065   for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
00066     delete PersonRecs[i];
00067 
00068   delete[] PersonRecs;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void FillPersonRecs(void)
00072 {
00073   size_t count = sizeof(PEOPLE) / sizeof(*PEOPLE);
00074   PersonRecs = (Person **) new Person[count];
00075 
00076   unsigned index = 0;
00077   for (size_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
00078   {
00079     Person *person = new Person;
00080     strcpy(person->ID, PEOPLE[i].ID);
00081     strcpy(person->lastName, PEOPLE[i].lastName);
00082     strcpy(person->firstName, PEOPLE[i].firstName);
00083     person->salary = PEOPLE[i].salary;
00084     person->years = PEOPLE[i].years;
00085     PersonRecs[index++] = person;
00086   }
00087 }

00089 unsigned ConstantHash(const char *, unsigned)
00090 {
00091   return 1;
00092 }
00093 
00094 unsigned ReflexiveHash(const char *Key, unsigned TableSize)
00095 {
00096   return static_cast<unsigned>(atoi(Key)) % TableSize;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void RevString(char *Key)
00100 {
00101   size_t len = strlen(Key);
00102   for (size_t i = 0; i < len / 2; i++)
00103   {
00104     char t = Key[i];
00105     Key[i] = Key[len - i - 1];
00106     Key[len - i - 1] = t;
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00110 unsigned PJWHash(const char *Key, unsigned TableSize)
00111 {
00112     // Initial value of hash
00113   unsigned hash = 0;
00114 
00115     // Process each char in the string
00116   while (*Key)
00117   {
00118       // Shift hash left 4
00119     hash = (hash << 4);
00120       
00121       // Add in current char
00122     hash = hash + static_cast<unsigned>(*Key);   
00123 
00124       // Get the four high-order bits
00125     unsigned bits = hash & 0xF0000000;
00126 
00127       // If any of the four bits are non-zero,
00128     if (bits)
00129     {
00130         // Shift the four bits right 24 positions (...bbbb0000)
00131         // and XOR them back in to the hash
00132       hash = hash ^ (bits >> 24); 
00133 
00134         // Now, XOR the four bits back in
00135       hash = hash ^ bits;         
00136     }
00137 
00138       // Next char
00139     Key++;   
00140   }
00141 
00142     // Modulo so hash is within 0 - TableSize
00143   return hash % TableSize;  
00144 }
00145 
00146 unsigned SimpleHash(const char *Key, unsigned TableSize)
00147 {
00148     // Initial value of hash
00149   unsigned hash = 0;
00150 
00151     // Process each char in the string
00152   while (*Key)
00153   {
00154       // Add in current char
00155     hash += static_cast<unsigned>(*Key);
00156 
00157       // Next char
00158     Key++;
00159   }
00160 
00161     // Modulo so hash is within the table
00162   return hash % TableSize;
00163 }
00164 
00165 unsigned RSHash(const char *Key, unsigned TableSize)
00166 {
00167   unsigned hash = 0;         // Initial value of hash
00168   unsigned multiplier = 127; // Prevent anomalies
00169 
00170     // Process each char in the string
00171   while (*Key)
00172   {
00173       // Adjust hash total
00174     hash = hash * multiplier;
00175 
00176       // Add in current char and mod result
00177     hash = (hash + static_cast<unsigned>(*Key)) % TableSize;
00178 
00179       // Next char
00180     Key++;
00181   }
00182 
00183     // Hash is within 0 - TableSize
00184   return hash;
00185 }
00186 
00187 unsigned UHash(const char *Key, unsigned TableSize)
00188 {
00189   unsigned hash = 0;       // Initial value of hash
00190   unsigned rand1 = 31415; // "Random" 1
00191   unsigned rand2 = 27183; // "Random" 2
00192 
00193     // Process each char in string
00194   while (*Key)
00195   {
00196       // Multiply hash by random
00197     hash = hash * rand1;
00198 
00199       // Add in current char, keep within TableSize
00200     hash = (hash + static_cast<unsigned>(*Key)) % TableSize;
00201 
00202       // Update rand1 for next "random" number
00203     rand1 = (rand1 * rand2) % (TableSize - 1);
00204 
00205       // Next char
00206     Key++;
00207   }
00208     // Hash value is within 0 - TableSize - 1
00209   return hash;
00210 }

00213 struct HashData
00214 {
00215   HASHFUNC Fn;
00216   const char *Name;
00217 };
00218 
00219 enum HASHFUNCS {NONE, CONSTANT, REFLEXIVE, SIMPLE, RS, UNIVERSAL, PJW};
00220 
00221 HashData HashingFuncs[] = {
00222   {0, "None (Linear probing)"}
00223   ,{ConstantHash, "Constant Hash (1)"}
00224   ,{ReflexiveHash, "Reflexive Hash"}
00225   ,{SimpleHash, "Simple Hash"}
00226   ,{RSHash, "RS Hash"}
00227   ,{UHash, "Universal Hash"}
00228   ,{PJWHash, "PJW Hash"}
00229 };

00235 template <typename T>
00236 void DummyDumpTable(const ChHashTable<T> &)
00237 {
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00241 template <typename T>
00242 void DumpTable(const ChHashTable<T> &ht)
00243 {
00244   char buffer[80];
00245   const typename ChHashTable<T>::ChHTHeadNode *head = ht.GetTable();
00246 
00247   for (unsigned i = 0; i < ht.GetStats().TableSize_; i++)
00248   {
00249     const typename ChHashTable<T>::ChHTNode *start = head[i].Nodes; 
00250     sprintf(buffer, "Slot: %3d ", i);
00251     cout << buffer;
00252     while (start)
00253     {
00254       sprintf(buffer, "--> %s ", start->Key);
00255       cout << buffer;
00256       start = start->Next;
00257     }
00258     cout << endl;
00259   }
00260 }
00261 
00262 template <typename T>
00263 void DummyDumpStats(const ChHashTable<T> &, ostream &)
00264 {
00265 }
00266 
00267 template <typename T>
00268 void DumpStats(const ChHashTable<T> &ht, ostream &os = cout)
00269 {
00270   os << "Number of probes: " << ht.GetStats().Probes_ << endl;
00271   os << "Number of expansions: " << ht.GetStats().Expansions_ << endl;
00272   os << "Items: " << ht.GetStats().Count_ << ", TableSize: " << ht.GetStats().TableSize_ << endl;
00273   os << "Load factor: " << setprecision(3) << (double) ht.GetStats().Count_ / (double) ht.GetStats().TableSize_ << endl;
00274 }

00276 // insert
00277 void Test1(HashData *phd)
00278 {
00279   const char *test = "Test1";
00280   cout << endl << "==================== " << test << " ====================" << endl;
00281 
00282   HASHFUNC phf = phd->Fn;
00283 
00284   unsigned initial_size = 11;
00285   double max_load_factor = 3.0;
00286   double growth_factor = 2.0;
00287 
00288   cout << endl << "Creating table:" << endl;
00289   cout << "Hash function: " << phd->Name << endl;
00290   cout << "Initial size: " << initial_size << endl;
00291   cout << "Max load factor: " << max_load_factor << endl;
00292   cout << "Growth factor: " << growth_factor << endl;
00293 
00294   typedef Person * T;
00295   ChHashTable<T> ht(ChHashTable<T>::HTConfig(initial_size, phf, max_load_factor, growth_factor, 0));
00296   try
00297   {
00298     char buf[10];
00299     //cout << "Inserting " << size << " items...\n";
00300     unsigned size = 30/*(unsigned)(initial_size * max_load_factor + 100)*/;
00301     for (unsigned i = 101; i <= size + 101; i++)
00302     {
00303       sprintf(buf, "%3i001", i);
00304       ht.insert(buf, 0);
00305       //DumpTable<T>(*ht);
00306       //DumpStats<T>(*ht);
00307       //cout << "==============================================================" << std::endl;
00308     }
00309     DumpTable<T>(ht);
00310     DumpStats<T>(ht);
00311     cout << endl;
00312   }
00313   catch (HashTableException &e)
00314   {
00315     std::cout << "Caught HashTableException in " << test << ": ";
00316     int value = e.code();
00317     if (value == HashTableException::E_DUPLICATE)
00318       std::cout << "E_DUPLICATE" << std::endl;
00319     else if (value == HashTableException::E_NO_MEMORY)
00320       std::cout << "E_NO_MEMORY" << std::endl;
00321     else if (value == HashTableException::E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
00322       std::cout << "E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND" << std::endl;
00323     else
00324       std::cout << "Unknown error code." << std::endl;
00325   }
00326   catch (...) 
00327   {
00328     cout << endl << "**** Something bad happened inserting in " << test << endl << endl;
00329   }
00330 }

00397 // insert/grow
00398 void Test3(HashData *phd)
00399 {
00400   const char *test = "Test3";
00401   cout << endl << "==================== " << test << " ====================" << endl;
00402 
00403   HASHFUNC phf = phd->Fn;
00404 
00405   unsigned initial_size = 11;
00406   double max_load_factor = 3.0;
00407   double growth_factor = 1.5;
00408 
00409   cout << endl << "Creating table:" << endl;
00410   cout << "Hash function: " << phd->Name << endl;
00411   cout << "Initial size: " << initial_size << endl;
00412   cout << "Max load factor: " << max_load_factor << endl;
00413   cout << "Growth factor: " << growth_factor << endl;
00414 
00415   typedef Person * T;
00416   ChHashTable<T> ht(ChHashTable<T>::HTConfig(initial_size, phf, max_load_factor, growth_factor, 0));
00417   try
00418   {
00419     char buf[10];
00420     //cout << "Inserting " << size << " items...\n";
00421     unsigned size = 60/*(unsigned)(initial_size * max_load_factor + 100)*/;
00422     for (unsigned i = 101; i <= size + 101; i++)
00423     {
00424       if ((ht.GetStats().Count_ + 1) / (double)ht.GetStats().TableSize_ > max_load_factor)
00425       {
00426         DumpTable<T>(ht);
00427         DumpStats<T>(ht);
00428         //cout << "==============================================================" << std::endl;
00429       }
00430       sprintf(buf, "%3i001", i);
00431       ht.insert(buf, 0);
00432     }
00433     DumpTable<T>(ht);
00434     DumpStats<T>(ht);
00435     cout << endl;
00436   }
00437   catch (HashTableException &e)
00438   {
00439     std::cout << "Caught HashTableException in " << test << ": ";
00440     int value = e.code();
00441     if (value == HashTableException::E_DUPLICATE)
00442       std::cout << "E_DUPLICATE" << std::endl;
00443     else if (value == HashTableException::E_NO_MEMORY)
00444       std::cout << "E_NO_MEMORY" << std::endl;
00445     else if (value == HashTableException::E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
00446       std::cout << "E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND" << std::endl;
00447     else
00448       std::cout << "Unknown error code." << std::endl;
00449   }
00450   catch (...) 
00451   {
00452     cout << endl << "**** Something bad happened inserting in " << test << endl << endl;
00453   }
00454 }

00642   cout << "Initial size: " << initial_size << endl;
00643   cout << "Max load factor: " << max_load_factor << endl;
00644   cout << "Growth factor: " << growth_factor << endl;
00645 
00646   typedef Person * T;
00647   ChHashTable<T> ht(ChHashTable<T>::HTConfig(initial_size, phf, max_load_factor, growth_factor, 0));
00648   try
00649   {
00650     char buf[10];
00651     //cout << "Inserting " << size << " items...\n";
00652     unsigned size = 30/*(unsigned)(initial_size * max_load_factor + 100)*/;
00653     for (unsigned i = 101; i <= size + 101; i++)
00654     {
00655       sprintf(buf, "%3i001", i);
00656       ht.insert(buf, 0);
00657       //DumpTable<T>(*ht);
00658       //DumpStats<T>(*ht);
00659       //cout << "==============================================================" << std::endl;
00660     }
00661     DumpTable<T>(ht);
00662     DumpStats<T>(ht);
00663     cout << endl;
00664 
00665     ht.clear();
00666 
00667     DumpTable<T>(ht);
00668     DumpStats<T>(ht);
00669     cout << endl;
00670  }
00671   catch (HashTableException &e)
00672   {
00673     std::cout << "Caught HashTableException in " << test << ": ";
00674     int value = e.code();
00675     if (value == HashTableException::E_DUPLICATE)
00676       std::cout << "E_DUPLICATE" << std::endl;
00677     else if (value == HashTableException::E_NO_MEMORY)
00678       std::cout << "E_NO_MEMORY" << std::endl;
00679     else if (value == HashTableException::E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND)
00680       std::cout << "E_ITEM_NOT_FOUND" << std::endl;
00681     else
00682       std::cout << "Unknown error code." << std::endl;
00683   }
00684   catch (...) 
00685   {
00686     cout << endl << "**** Something bad happened inserting in " << test << endl << endl;
00687   }
00688 }
00689 
00690 // small stress with allocator
00691 void Test7(HashData *phd)
00692 {
00693   cout << endl << "==================== Test7 ====================" << endl;
00694 
00695   HASHFUNC phf = phd->Fn;
00696 
00697   unsigned size = 100;
00698   unsigned initial_size = 13;
00699   double max_load_factor = 4.0;
00700   double growth_factor = 1.2;
00701 
00702   cout << endl << "Creating table:" << endl;
00703   cout << "Hash function: " << phd->Name << endl;
00704   cout << "Initial size: " << initial_size << endl;
00705   cout << "Max load factor: " << max_load_factor << endl;
00706   cout << "Growth factor: " << growth_factor << endl;
00707 
00708   typedef Person * T;
00709 
00710   OAConfig config(true);
00711   ObjectAllocator *oa = new ObjectAllocator(sizeof(ChHashTable<T>::ChHTNode), config);
00712   ChHashTable<T> *ht = new ChHashTable<T>(ChHashTable<T>::HTConfig(initial_size, phf, max_load_factor, growth_factor, 0), oa);
00713   try
00714   {
00715     unsigned i;
00716     char buf[10];
00717     cout << "\nInserting " << size << " items...\n";
00718     for (i = 1; i <= size; i++)
00719     {
00720       sprintf(buf, "%09i", i);
00721       ht->insert(buf, 0);
00722     }
00723     
00724     DumpTable<T>(*ht);
00725     DumpStats<T>(*ht);
00726     cout << endl;
00727 #if 1
00728     cout << "Deleting " << (size - 20) << " items...";
00729     for (i = 1; i <= size - 20; i++)
00730     {
00731       sprintf(buf, "%09i", i);
00732       ht->remove(buf);
00733     }
00734     cout << endl;
00735     DumpTable<T>(*ht);
00736     DumpStats<T>(*ht);
00737     cout << endl;
00738 #endif
00739   }
00740   catch (HashTableException &)
00741   {
00742     //cout << endl << "errno: " << e.code() << ", " << e.what() << endl << endl;
00743     cout << endl << "**** Caught exception inserting/deleting item. (SimpleTest2) ****" << endl << endl;
00744   }
00745   catch (...) 
00746   {
00747     cout << endl << "**** Something bad happened inserting in SimpleTest2" << endl << endl;
00748   }
00749 
00750   delete ht;
00751   delete oa;
00752 }
00753 
00754 // stress
00755 void Test8(HashData *phd)
00756 {
00757   cout << endl << "==================== StressTest ====================" << endl;
00758 
00759   HASHFUNC phf = phd->Fn;
00760 
00761   unsigned size = 1000000;
00762   unsigned initial_size = 5; //4344479;
00763   double max_load_factor = 2.5;
00764   double growth_factor = 1.5;
00765 
00766   cout << endl << "Creating table:" << endl;
00767   cout << "Hash function: " << phd->Name << endl;
00768   cout << "Initial size: " << initial_size << endl;
00769   cout << "Max load factor: " << max_load_factor << endl;
00770   cout << "Growth factor: " << growth_factor << endl;
00771 
00772   typedef Person * T;
00773 
00774   OAConfig config(true);
00775   ObjectAllocator *oa = new ObjectAllocator(sizeof(ChHashTable<T>::ChHTNode), config);
00776   ChHashTable<T> *ht = new ChHashTable<T>(ChHashTable<T>::HTConfig(initial_size, phf, max_load_factor, growth_factor, 0), oa);
00777   try
00778   {
00779     unsigned i;
00780     char buf[10];
00781     cout << "\nInserting " << size << " items...\n";
00782     for (i = 1; i <= size; i++)
00783     {
00784       sprintf(buf, "%09i", i);
00785       ht->insert(buf, 0);
00786     }
00787     
00788     //DumpTable<T>(*ht);
00789     DumpStats<T>(*ht);
00790     cout << endl;
00791 #if 1
00792     cout << "Deleting " << size << " items...";
00793     for (i = 1; i <= size; i++)
00794     {
00795       sprintf(buf, "%09i", i);
00796       ht->remove(buf);
00797     }
00798     cout << endl;
00799     DumpStats<T>(*ht);
00800     cout << endl;
00801 #endif
00802   }
00803   catch (HashTableException &)
00804   {
00805     //cout << endl << "errno: " << e.code() << ", " << e.what() << endl << endl;
00806     cout << endl << "**** Caught exception inserting/deleting item. (SimpleTest2) ****" << endl << endl;
00807   }
00808   catch (...) 
00809   {
00810     cout << endl << "**** Something bad happened inserting in SimpleTest2" << endl << endl;
00811   }
00812 
00813   delete ht;
00814   delete oa;
00815 }
00816 
00817 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00818 {
00819   FillPersonRecs();
00820 
00821   //enum HASHFUNCS {NONE, CONSTANT, REFLEXIVE, SIMPLE, RS, UNIVERSAL, PJW}; 
00822   HASHFUNCS hf = UNIVERSAL;
00823 
00824   int test_num = 0;
00825   if (argc > 1)
00826     test_num = atoi(argv[1]);
00827 
00828   switch(test_num)
00829   {
00830     case 1:
00831       Test1(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // insert
00832       break;
00833 
00834     case 2:
00835       Test2(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // insert/delete
00836       break;
00837 
00838     case 3:
00839       Test3(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // insert/grow
00840       break;
00841 
00842     case 4:
00843       Test4(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // insert/find/exception (NOT_FOUND)
00844       break;
00845 
00846     case 5:
00847       Test5(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // insert duplicate
00848       break;
00849 
00850     case 6:
00851       Test6(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // insert clear
00852       break;
00853 
00854     case 7:
00855       Test7(&HashingFuncs[hf]);  // small stress with allocator
00856       break;
00857 
00858     case 8:
00859       Test8(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // stress
00860       break;
00861 
00862     default:
00863       Test1(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // insert
00864       Test2(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // insert/delete
00865       Test3(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // insert/grow
00866       Test4(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // insert/find/exception (NOT_FOUND)
00867       Test5(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // insert duplicate
00868       Test6(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // insert clear
00869       Test7(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // small stress with allocator
00870       Test8(&HashingFuncs[hf]); // stress
00871       break;
00872   }
00873 
00874   FreePersonRecs();
00875   return 0;
00876 }
